item.title: Installing Metallb on K3s RPI cluster with tailscale
item.description: Metallb on bare-metal k3s raspberry pi kubernetes cluster. Testing the metallb installation by deploying pihole. We’ll be using the DNS features of pihole later.

item.title: Tailscale on RPIs
item.description: Installing tailscale on my machines to make them accessible from anywhere in the world.
